props.sql:
WITH common AS (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AS recent_days),
     activities AS (SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'issue' AS type
                    FROM issues
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'pr' AS type
                    FROM pull_requests
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, starred_repos.repo_id AS _id, 'star' AS type
                    FROM starred_repos
                    WHERE starred_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'issue_comment' AS type
                    FROM issue_comments
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common))
SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(r.owner, '/', r.name), '(unknown)') AS repo,
       COUNT(*)                                          AS activities
FROM activities a
         LEFT JOIN repos r ON a.repo_id = r.id
WHERE a.user_id = (SELECT id FROM curr_user)
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC

WITH common AS (SELECT DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) AS recent_days),
     activities AS (SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'issue' AS type
                    FROM issues
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'pr' AS type
                    FROM pull_requests
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, starred_repos.repo_id AS _id, 'star' AS type
                    FROM starred_repos
                    WHERE starred_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common)
                    UNION
                    SELECT repo_id, user_id, id AS _id, 'issue_comment' AS type
                    FROM issue_comments
                    WHERE created_at > (SELECT recent_days FROM common))
SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(r.owner, '/', r.name), '(unknown)') AS repo,
       COUNT(*)                                          AS activities
FROM activities a
         LEFT JOIN repos r ON a.repo_id = r.id
WHERE a.user_id = (SELECT id FROM curr_user)
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC
